Class SQLiteManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteManager

  • public class SQLiteManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the SQLite database.
    Version:
    6
    Author:
    Arya Khokhar

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String basePath 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SQLiteManager(java.lang.String basePath)
      This constructor creates a new database if it has not already been made.

        public static java.lang.String basePath

    • Constructor Detail

      • SQLiteManager

        public SQLiteManager(java.lang.String basePath)
        This constructor creates a new database if it has not already been made. If it has been made, then it connects to it.
        Parameters:
        basePath - the string path to the database in resources

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        public java.sql.Connection getConnection()
        This method is for client classes to access the Connection field.
        Returns:
        the connection field

      • initTables

        public void initTables()
        This method creates the four different tables to represent Attendance, Classrooms, Students, and Students in Class. It also adds the sample database to it.

        Parameters:

        studentId - of student to marked as absent/present
        date - Attendance date

      • addStudentToClassroom

        public boolean addStudentToClassroom(int studentId,
                                     int classroomId)
        This method adds a given student ID to a given classroom ID.
        Parameters:
        studentId - student id to be added to a classroom
        classroomId - classroom id to which a student is to be added
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if the student was added to the class

      • deleteStudentFromClassroom

        public boolean deleteStudentFromClassroom(int studentId,
                                          int classroomId)
        This method removes a given student id from a given classroom ID.
        Parameters:
        studentId - student ID to be deleted from a classroom
        classroomId - classroom ID from which a student is to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the student was removed from the class and false otherwise
